title: Got A Poem? Leave A Poem! Need A Poem? Take A Poem!
content: Ferry to Bremerton, Washington by Barret Anspach via Flickr https://www.flickr.com/photos/anspach/ The world needs your poems! Or at least the town of Bremerton, Washington does, according to this post from JHarris. Click the link to learn where to send yours!
author: Loup
